comment.author: 12786567@N06
comment._content: Looks like one of the Webster boys. They've all passed on now.

comment.author: 12786567@N06
comment._content: I showed this to a friend, she's pretty sure that's Curtis Webster. He lost the fingers of one hand in a railroad accident.

comment._content:
